chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Ronaille Vevanios, p. 53—Aes Sedai of unknown Ajah. She was stilled by Rand during the battle at Dumai's Wells. She has since been Healed by Damer Flinn. She has been granted special privilege by the Wise Ones, and is free to come and go as she pleases.
